title: US, Congo Eye Minerals Pact Amid Push for Peace Deal with Rwanda
description: The Democratic Republic of Congo aims to sign a minerals and infrastructure partnership with the Trump administration on Thursday as part of a series of deals targeted at ending a long-running conflict in the eastern part of the resource-rich African nation.
